headline: Is Expand Energy (EXE) Recasting Its Strategic Identity With New Leadership And A Houston Headquarters Shift?
summary: In early February 2026, Expand Energy Corporation appointed Board Chairman Michael Wichterich as Interim President and CEO following Domenic J. Dell’Osso Jr.’s departure, while Dell’Osso remains an external advisor to support the leadership transition. The company also decided to move its corporate headquarters from Oklahoma City to the Houston area by mid-2026, aiming to deepen ties with energy industry partners while keeping Oklahoma City as an operational hub. We’ll now examine how the...
